name: Harmonic Tremelo
description: A harmonic tremelo is basically a pair of tremelos that are 180 degrees out of  phase.  The first tremelo is run through a low pass filter and the second tremelo is run through a high pass filter.  The result is a tremelo type  sounds but the volume remains rather constant.
center-pot-function: Crossover frequency between low and high end
right-switch-function: Tap it a few times to set the vibrato tempo
creator: DreamMaker
